DOC.brief_summary: Demonstrate that the Karius Infectious Disease Diagnostic Sequencing Assay performed on plasma can accurately detect the microbiologic etiology in febrile allogeneic stem-cell transplant patients when compared with standard clinical diagnostics
DOC.brief_title: The DISCOVER Trial (Diagnosis of Infection in Stem Cell Transplant Patients OVER Time)
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older Patients who plan on undergoing an allogeneic stem cell transplant and are admitted to UCSF Medical Center. Inability to provide informed consent and comply with studyrelated procedures
